cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Shared Tent
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The small Tee Pee includes fans, fresh linen and pillows. The small Tee Pee is next to the communal facilities including kitchen, laundry, Pool, volleyball court, bathrooms and shower.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The Surf Shack, this surfer inspired large dorm is decorated in a surf style theme. Set away from the main part of the hostel , there is a short walk along an uncovered pathway to the bathrooms which are located in the main hostel.

dorms.name: Basic 10 Bed Shared Tent
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The Big Tee Pee includes fresh linen and pillows. Depending on the season the tee pee will include fans or a fireplace.  The Big Tee Pee is next to the communal facilities including kitchen, laundry, Pool, volleyball court, bathrooms and shower.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Located around the pool on the upper level in the main building. It is only a short walk to the bathrooms and the kitchen. Pillows and linen are provided.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Island retreat twin room includes a double bed with a single bunk bed on top, fresh linen and pillows, bedside table,wardrobe and power points for charging. The room has a private deck and chairs that overlook the rainforest and lake. Max of 2 guests

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Located on the lower level and adjacent to the pool are the Cozy Cubes. Perfect for couples they have a bar fridge, table and chairs and a fan for your comfort. Duvets and pillows are provided free of charge.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
